prompt:
['Carbomer and Carboxymethylcellulose', '209510', 'Clinical Protocol V1.0', '15.2', 'Application Instructions:', 'Apply product (thin strips) to clean and dry dentures as:', 'Upper denture - Apply product in a long continuous strip, not too close to the denture', 'edge, as shown in the image above. In the center, apply 2 shorter strips in the middle', 'of the denture, as shown in the image above.', 'Lower Denture - Apply product in a long continuous strip, not too close to the denture', 'edge, as shown in the image above.', 'Rinse your mouth with tap water before inserting dentures.', 'Press dentures into place, hold firmly, and bite down for a few seconds to secure hold.', 'Adhesive should be applied once daily.', 'For the first time, use a small amount then use more if needed. Too much adhesive can', 'cause oozing; apply less next time if this occurs. It may take a few tries to find the right', 'amount for your denture.', 'Removal Instructions:', 'Swish mouth with water.', 'Slowly remove denture using a rocking motion.', 'Remove adhesive residue from denture and mouth with warm water and supplied denture', 'brush.', 'Thoroughly clean your denture in your usual manner and then rinse with water.', 'GlaxoSmithKline Consumer Healthcare
